name: BanG Dream! - Puzzle Pico
description:
This is a fan made puzzle game based on the BanG Dream! series. This game takes direct inspiration from episode 9 of Garupa Pico OHMORI, which depicts what seems to be an animated mock-up for a  BanG  Dream! puzzle game in which the player must match up characters from the series with their corresponding band members. I decided to make a playable game based on this concept and add in some extra features that were not present in the source material.

CONTROLS (Keyboard):

Left and Right Arrow Keys: Move left and right

Down Arrow Key:  Fall faster

Up Arrow Key: Quick Drop

Z and X Keys: Rotate left and right

On-screen controls can be enabled for mobile users.

How To Play:

Match up characters from the same band. If all five band members connect, they will disappear and points will be scored. Obstacles will also fall for certain characters, which can be cleared by matching characters near those obstacles. The game speed will increase every time you get a match.

Features:
  • Unlike the original episode, Raise A Suilen  and Morfonica members will also appear in the game.
  • When using the rotate buttons as Kokoro, you will move upwards, allowing you to go against gravity (this is seen in the original episode).
  • Easter Egg: Michelle has a 10% chance of spawning as Misaki (no bear costume) instead.
Coming Soon:
  • Puyo-Puyo inspired Versus Mode
  • Downloadable versions for PC and Android
